patthana22.23:4.1: Nahīnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.23:5.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.23:6.1: Namicchattaniyataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.23:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.23:8.1: Namaggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.23:9.1: Hetuyā chabbīsa … pe … āsevane pannarasa … pe … avigate chabbīsa.
patthana22.23:10.1: Naanuppanno nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.23:10.2: Nauppādī nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.23:10.3: Naanuppanno nanahetu ca nauppādī nanahetu ca dhammā uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.23:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye cha, pacchājāte vipāke indriye magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
